Wireline Gross Adds.description: Total number of new wireline customers or subscribers added during a period.

Wireless Gross Adds.description: Total number of new wireless customers or subscribers added during a period.

Wireline Net Adds.description: The net change in wireline subscribers, calculated as gross adds minus disconnects.

Wireless Net Adds.description: The net change in wireless subscribers, calculated as gross adds minus disconnects.

Wireline Disconnects.description: Total number of wireline customers who terminated their service during a period.

Wireless Disconnects.description: Total number of wireless customers who terminated their service during a period.

Wireline Churn Rate.description: The percentage of wireline subscribers who cancelled or did not renew their subscriptions.

Wireless Churn Rate.description: The percentage of wireless subscribers who cancelled or did not renew their subscriptions.

NPS Score.description: Net Promoter Score, measuring customer loyalty and willingness to recommend the service.

QES Score.description: Quality of Experience Score, reflecting overall customer satisfaction with service quality.

Service Related Call Volume.description: Total number of customer calls related to service issues or inquiries.

Sales Related Call Volume.description: Total number of customer calls related to sales inquiries, new subscriptions, or upgrades.

ARPA.description: Average revenue generated per wireless user over a specific period.

Wireless Disconnects with 30 days device.description: Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 30 days of changing their device.

Wireless Disconnects with 60 days device.description: Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 60 days of changing their device.

Wireless Disconnects with 90 days device.description: Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 90 days of changing their device.

Wireless Disconnects with 30 days plan c.description: Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 30 days of changing their plan.

Wireless Disconnects with 60 days plan c.description: Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 60 days of changing their plan.

Wireless Disconnects with 90 days plan c.description: Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 90 days of changing their plan.

Wireless Disconnects with Bill Shock.description: Number of wireless customers who disconnected due to an unexpectedly high bill.

Wireless Port In.description: Number of new wireless customers who transferred their existing phone number from another carrier.

Wireless Port Out.description: Number of wireless customers who transferred their phone number to another carrier.

Wireless Disconnects with Promo acceptan.description: Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 30 days of accepting a promotional offer.
Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 60 days of accepting a promotional offer.
Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 90 days of accepting a promotional offer.

Wireless Disconnects with Offer acceptan.description: Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 30 days of accepting a specific offer.
Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 60 days of accepting a specific offer.
Number of wireless customers who disconnected within 90 days of accepting a specific offer.

Wireless Net Adds AAL.description: Net increase in wireless lines by existing customers adding new lines to their accounts.

Wireless Net Adds New customers.description: Net increase in wireless customers who are entirely new to the service.

Average Call handling Time - Service.description: Average duration of calls handled by customer service agents related to service issues.

Average Call handling time - Sales.description: Average duration of calls handled by customer service agents related to sales.

Number of Customer Interactions - App.description: Total number of customer interactions via the mobile application.

Number of Customer Interactions - Portal.description: Total number of customer interactions via the online customer portal.

Number of Customer Interactions - Call C.description: Total number of customer interactions handled by call centers.

Number of Customer Interactions - Store.description: Total number of customer interactions occurring in physical stores.

Customer Trouble Tickets Count.description: Total count of customer-reported issues or problems.

Customer Trouble Tickets - Network Cover.description: Number of customer trouble tickets specifically related to network coverage issues.

Customer Trouble Tickets - Call Drop.description: Number of customer trouble tickets specifically related to dropped calls.

Customer Trouble Tickets - Discount Rela.description: Number of customer trouble tickets specifically related to issues with discounts or promotions.

Customer Trouble Tickets - Slow Net Spee.description: Number of customer trouble tickets specifically related to slow internet speeds.

Number of Customer Interactions.description: Overall total count of all customer interactions across various channels.

Number Of Customers with Late Fee Waiver.description: Count of customers who received a waiver for late payment fees.

Number Of Customers with Autopay Discoun.description: Count of customers who are enrolled in autopay and receive a discount.
